subSections.title: Pronunciation 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=gòng,gōng
|m_note=gōng - Taiwan standard for “to confess; confession”, and Mainland standard for “to look after”. In actual usage, however, the two pronunciations are often confused
|c=gung3
|h=pfs=kiûng/kiung
|md=gé̤ṳng
|mn=ml:kiòng/kèng
|mn_note=kiòng - literary; kèng - vernacular
|w=2jion,2kon
|w_note=2jion - vernacular; 2kon - literary
|mc=2
|oc=n,2
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[present]] [[incense]] or [[offerings]] before the [[image]] of a [[god]] or the [[deceased]]; to [[enshrine]] and [[worship]]
# [[offering]]; [[tribute]]; [[sacrifice]]
# to [[assume]] [[office]]
# to [[confess]]; to [[own up]]; to make a [[confession]] of
# [[confession]]; [[admission]]; [[owning]] up
# to [[look after]] (one's parents or children etc.); to [[support]]
